recordTypes.name: Residential Building Permit Application
recordTypes.description: This application is used for all work on a residential structure requiring a building permit.  This includes new homes & guest houses (or ADUs), accessory structures, additions, alterations, repairs and demolition.  For installation of solid fuel-burning appliances (i.e. woodstoves) please use this application and select "other".

recordTypes.name: Septage/Grease Pump-out Permit
recordTypes.description: Permit to have a septic system or grease trap pumped.  Permit must be obtained by a Edgartown licensed septage pumper/hauler.

recordTypes.name: ABOVE GROUND PROPANE - 2025 TEST - FOR JOSH
Commercial Building Permit Application
recordTypes.description: This application is used for all commercial work requiring a building permit.  This includes new construction, accessory structures, additions, alterations, repairs and demolition.

recordTypes.name: Food Establishment Permit Application (New 2026)
recordTypes.description: Application for restaurants, grocery stores, caterers, etc.

recordTypes.name: Pool Permit Application
recordTypes.description: This application is used for the installation or change to a swimming pool and/or spa.

recordTypes.name: Temporary Food Event Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Applications must be submitted no less than 72 hours before an event.

recordTypes.name: Solar Permit Application
recordTypes.description: This application is used for all solar arrays, roof or ground mounted.

recordTypes.name: Electrical Permit Application
recordTypes.description: This permit is required when installing any electrical wiring, electrical appliances, electrical services, etc. Also includes low voltage wiring including cable TV, internet, phones, fire protection systems, security alarm systems, etc.

recordTypes.name: Gas Permit Application
recordTypes.description: This permit is required when propane gas piping is installed, altered, added to or repaired, including the installation of gas fired appliances. You must be a licensed professional to apply for this permit.

recordTypes.name: Test by IT  Dept - YARD
recordTypes.description: Apply for a Yard, Garage, Tag or Estate Sale

recordTypes.name: Plumbing Permit Application
recordTypes.description: This permit is required when plumbing is being installed, altered, removed, replaced or repaired. You must be a licensed professional to apply for this permit.

recordTypes.name: Septic Installer License
recordTypes.description: A license to install septic systems is renewable annually on January 1st and expires on December 31st.

recordTypes.name: Septic Pumper/Hauler License
recordTypes.description: Pumpers/Hauler licenses are renewable annually on January 1st and expire on December 31st.

recordTypes.name: Tent Application
recordTypes.description: This permit application is for the erection of tents and other temporary structures that exceed 400 square feet (aggregate of all temporary structures on the lot) and that will be in place for less than 180 days.

recordTypes.name: Tobacco Sales Permit
recordTypes.description: Tobacco sales permits are renewable annually on January 1st

recordTypes.name: Sign Permit Application
recordTypes.description: The Town of Edgartown requires a sign permit before any sign may be erected. See Edgartown Zoning Bylaw Article XI, Section 11.4 for all sign requirements.

recordTypes.name: Trench Permit
recordTypes.description: Pursuant to G.L. c. 82A ยง1 and 520 CMR 7.00 et seq.(as amended)

categories.name: Building Department
